attributes.action: follow Norway's lead and open aid links with the democratically elected Palestinian government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Palestinian people continue to suffer an aid embargo orchestrated by the US and imitated by the EU. All for democratically electing the 'wrong' party, which supports the use of 'unconventional' warfare in response to the overly aggessive policies of Israel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
